sentences.sContent: the Marshal of the Royal Air force

remMethod.val: “马首” → 最高指挥官好比群马之首 → 最高指挥官

words.tran: 元帅；典礼官；执法官；法官的随行官员（等于judge's marshal）
各就各位；按次序排列成形（等于marshal）

trans.tranCn: 元帅，最高指挥官；总指挥，司仪；执法官，警察局长，消防队长
trans.tranOther: an officer of the highest rank in the army or air force of some countries

trans.tranCn: 整理， 排列， 集结
trans.tranOther: to organize your thoughts, ideas etc so that they are clear, effective, or easy to understand
